mapper.select: select pollid, id, question, sdate, edate, itemcount, polltotal, regdate from poll order by sdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into poll(id, question, sdate, edate, itemcount, polltotal, regdate) values(#{id}, #{question}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{itemcount}, 0, now())
insert into pollsub(pollid, answer, acount) values ( (select ifnull(max(pollid), 0) from poll), #{answer}, 0)
insert into voter(pollid, pollsubid, id, regdate) values (#{pollid}, #{pollsubid}, #{id}, now())
